Description:
You can use the search interaction to query for medications dispensed to a patient.

This resource can return various types of medications, including prescriptions, inpatient-ordered medications, and clinic-administered medications (CAMS). This resource searches the pharmacist verification of medication dispenses, rather than the actual dispenses. Note that MedicationDispense only functions for organizations in the Netherlands.

patient.Name: patient
patient.Optional: Either patient or subject must be provided. If both are provided, they must match.

subject.Name: subject
subject.Optional: Either patient or subject must be provided. If both are provided, they must match.

Bundle.Name: Bundle
Bundle.Description: Resource bundle. For more information, refer to the FHIR specification.

MedicationDispense.Name: MedicationDispense
MedicationDispense.Description: A single instance of a MedicationDispense resource.

authoredOn.Name: extension
authoredOn.Description: The date the medication was verified.

authorizingPrescription.Name: authorizingPrescription
authorizingPrescription.Description: Reference to the medication request that triggered the dispense.

category.Name: category
category.Description:
Type of medication dispense.

Hard-coded to SNOMED code 422037009.

context.Name: context
context.Description: Reference to the encounter associated with the dispense.

additionalInstruction.Name: additionalInstruction
additionalInstruction.Description: The administration instructions for the medication.

doseAndRate.Name: doseAndRate
doseAndRate.Description: Information about the ranges and quantities of doses and rates.

repeat.Name: repeat
repeat.Description: Element indicating an event that occurs multiple times.

boundsPeriod.Name: boundsPeriod
boundsPeriod.Description: The start and end dates for the medication.

duration.Name: duration
duration.Description: The medication duration. If duration is expressed as a range, this element is populated with the minimum duration.

durationMax.Name: durationMax
durationMax.Description: If duration is expressed as a range, this element is populated with the maximum duration.

medicationReference.Name: medicationReference
medicationReference.Description: The FHIR ID representation of the ordered medication.

performer.Name: performer
performer.Description: The organization where a dispense was verified.

actor.Name: actor
actor.Description: The organization where the medication was verified.

periodOfUse.Name: extension
periodOfUse.Description: The start and end dates for the medication.

status.Name: status
status.Description:
The status of the medication dispense. Can be either:

  • Completed
  • Entered-in-error

stopType.Name: extension
stopType.Description: Indicates whether a medication is temporarily or permanently inactive.

subject.Name: subject
subject.Description: Who the medication is being dispensed to.

usageDuration.Name: extension
usageDuration.Description: The duration of a medicationâ€™s use.
